name: NeuroSlicers
description:
NeuroSlicers is an online real time strategy game set in the city of The Catena, a megalopolis where it’s citizens experience every day life in an Artificial Reality layer known as the NeuroNet.

You play as a Slicer, a new kind of future hacker on a journey to discover the truth about the Network and the Corporations that govern it.

Customise your Deck with powerful Scripts, made up of a wide variety of Units, Constructs and Function powers. Choose a NodeStack and find your playstyle while you shape the ongoing and evolving story across PVE and PVP modes.

Meet and trade with the city’s cast of characters and ultimately earn their trust and favour on your journey to become ultimate Slicer.
